title: Pixel launcher is crashing after android 11 update on my pixel 3.
content: After the android 11 update, build number (RP1A.200720.009), on my pixel 3, the pixel launcher keeps on crashing.I'm having trouble with gestures as forward and back gestures completely turn off. I also tried with the basic navigation icons but they also sometimes freezes. Have to completely restart my device to overcome this.
